content: the court has ruled on the open succession of a person named sc gi who has passed away the estate which includes various properties and lands will be divided equally among the children named al sa al ve al gi al an al mi al ma al ro and al nu the properties will be sold and the proceeds will be distributed among the heirs the court has also determined the costs of the expert report and other legal expenses which will be paid by the heirs the plaintiffs have been ordered to pay legal costs to the defendants the courts decision was made on january 7 2022 and filed in the clerks office on january 19 2022
